`r flipbookr::chunk_reveal('geom_point_sample_1', title = '### geom_point_sample')`

```{r geom_point_sample_1, include = F}
# using the function
set.seed(92389)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = cars) +
 aes(x = speed, y = dist) +
 geom_point() +
 geom_point_sample(color = "red") +
 geom_point_sample(color = "green", sample_size = 5) +
 geom_point_sample(sample_size = 2, color = "blue")
```
